00034 namespace RDK2 { namespace RepositoryNS {
00035 
00036 Property* Repository::getProperty(CUrl url, Session* session) throw (NoSuchProperty)
00037 {
00038     if (isLocalProperty(url)) return getLocalProperty(url);
00039     else return getRemoteProperty(url, session);
00040 }
00041 
00042 Property* Repository::getLocalProperty(CUrl aurl) throw (NoSuchProperty)
00043 {
00044     Url url = aurl;
00045     if (url.isComplete()) {
00046         if (url.getHost() != getRepositoryName()) {
00047             throw NoSuchProperty("Property '" + url + "' is not mine!");
00048         }
00049         else {
00050             url = url.getPath();
00051         }
00052     }
00053     propertiesMutex.lock(HERE);
00054     map<Url, Property*>::iterator it = localProperties.find(url);
00055     if (it == localProperties.end()) {
00056         propertiesMutex.unlock();
00057         throw NoSuchProperty("Property '" + url + "' does not exists");
00058     }
00059     propertiesMutex.unlock();
00060     return it->second;
00061 }
00062 
00063 // FIXME deprecated
00064 Property* Repository::getProperty(CUrl aurl) throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00065 {
00066     if (!aurl.isAbsolute() && !aurl.isComplete()) 
00067         throw InvalidOperation("Url has to be absolute or complete ('" + aurl + "')");
00068     Url url = aurl;
00069     Property* p;
00070     propertiesMutex.lock(HERE);
00071     for (int redirCount = 0; redirCount < MAX_LINK_LEVELS; redirCount++) {
00072         if (isLocalProperty(url)) {
00073             if (url.isComplete()) url = url.getPath();
00074             map<Url, Property*>::iterator it = localProperties.find(url);
00075             if (it == localProperties.end()) {
00076                 propertiesMutex.unlock();
00077                 throw NoSuchProperty("Property '" + (string) url + "' does not exists");
00078             }
00079             p = it->second;
00080             if (p->deleted) {
00081                 propertiesMutex.unlock();
00082                 throw NoSuchProperty("Property '" + (string) url + "' has been deleted");
00083             }
00084             if (p->isLink()) url = p->linkTo;
00085             else {
00086                 propertiesMutex.unlock();
00087                 return p;
00088             }
00089         }
00090         else {
00091             propertiesMutex.unlock();
00092             return getRemoteProperty(url, 0);
00093             //throw InvalidOperation("Old Repository::getProperty used for property '" + url + "'");
00094         }
00095     }
00096     propertiesMutex.unlock();
00097     throw InvalidOperation("Too many link levels");
00098 }
00099 
00100 bool Repository::isLocalProperty(CUrl url) throw()
00101 {
00102     return (url.isAbsolute() || (url.isComplete() && url.getHost() == repositoryName));
00103 }
